pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, March 4, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island

9:20 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Veterans Affairs Lawrence MacAulay will meet with Premier of Prince Edward Island Wade MacLauchlan.

Delta Hotels Prince Edward
18 Queen Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Tilley Room no later than 8:45 a.m.

10:50 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Veterans Affairs Lawrence MacAulay will visit with employees at the Department of Veterans Affairs Canada.

Closed to media.

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Veterans Affairs Lawrence MacAulay will tour BioVectra Inc. and make a jobs announcement. A media availability will follow.

BioVectra Inc.
11 Aviation Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for the tour
  • Open coverage of the announcement and media availability
  • Media are asked to arrive to the main entrance no later than 11:15 a.m.
